data.text: @caitycoyne @PhilKabler Does he still have ties to Russia? At one time he sold a mine and then some reason bought it back. Has anyone ever thought it was actually collateral? How does he get away from never serving time for all the debts he owns?
@caitycoyne Jethro Bodine and Uncle Jed and the moron enjoys wide support in the State.  The ugly stereotypes are not stereotypes - they’re accurate descriptors.
@caitycoyne Natural gas industry trying to cash in on a crisis.
@caitycoyne Did you mention that he referenced Jethro Bodine and the cement pond in his discussion of energy?
@caitycoyne Quoting Beverly Hillbillies bc he watches MeTV all day. As per usual bashing @POTUS @DearPOTUS46 hope you’re watching the WVGovernor. He’s dangerous and good @ acting dumb. ⚠️
@caitycoyne @PhilKabler The irony of trying to call out a Democrat president for that which you'd ball cup a republican president. Wish ironic gaslighting caused physical pain so bad it left scars
@caitycoyne @PhilKabler His "COVID briefings" have turned into Democratic political bashing

@caitycoyne He's gotten away with so much with zero accountability thanks to these "virtual pressers". 
HOW are we still allowing this??🤯

@realitytourist Yeah, they do it on Twitter, Facebook and YouTube. You can watch the archived ones on the YouTube page. Here's today's:https://t.co/NnIiknRYDY

I stopped logging on a while ago. They've gotten less useful each week -- I don't know why we're still doing them 3x a week tbh.
